Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Dakonan Junction is a vital trade route.

Clear the junction of {@LinkCreature:56#4#bleakbone dragoons}, devan {@LinkCreature:56#5#fateshapers}, {@LinkCreature:56#6#reapers}, {@LinkCreature:56#55#viziers}, and {@LinkCreature:56#56#reavers}, and Bleakrock {@LinkCreature:56#22#shamans} and {@LinkCreature:56#20#destroyers}.

Report to Emya in Dragonfall when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
